    toc: false
---

```{r, include=FALSE}
library(knitr)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, eval=TRUE, echo=FALSE)
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(dplyr))
```

```{r, results='asis'}
dir <- "slides/"
list.files(dir) %>%
  sort %>% 
  grep("\\.(html|pdf)$", ., value=TRUE) %>% 
  grep("r-rnaseq-airway\\.html", ., invert = TRUE, value=TRUE) %>% 
  grep("^index\\.html$", ., value=TRUE, invert=TRUE) %>% 
  paste0("- [", ., "](", paste0(dir, .), ")") %>% 
  cat(sep="\n")
```
